title.rendered: “IDF, Shin Bet, and Border Police Thwart Terror: 13 Arrests & Weapon Seizures Across Judea, Samaria, and Jordan Valley”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF troops, Shin Bet and Border Police arrested 13 wanted individuals last night across Judea and Samaria and in the Jordan Valley and Valleys Brigade. In a brigade operation to thwart terror in Jericho, the forces arrested individuals and located weapons.

The soldiers operated last night to arrest 13 wanted individuals across Judea and Samaria and in the Jordan Valley and Valleys Brigade. In a brigade operation to thwart terror in Jericho, the forces arrested four individuals, located and confiscated weapons, and carried out extensive searches.

In the village of Dura in the Judea Brigade, four suspects were arrested and two pistols were located and confiscated. In Qalqilya in the Ephraim Brigade, terror funds were confiscated. In Lubban al-Sharqiya in the Binyamin Brigade, many forces entered to conduct weapons searches and incidental arrests.

The arrested individuals have been handed over for further investigation by the security forces, there were no casualties to our forces.

So far, since the beginning of the war, about 3,500 wanted individuals have been arrested across the Judea and Samaria Division and the Jordan Valley and Valleys Brigade, more than 1,500 of them are affiliated with the Hamas terror organization.

Attached are images from the forces’ activity: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC14032024.156189189

Attached is documentation on the matter: https://bit.ly/3IA4Y2c
